name: 蝶生梦影-Butterfly dream shadow
description: Player Sui Mu is an egg that was killed in an accident on the way to his predecessor's wedding. But fortunately, she was selected by the West as a 'system'. As long as she completes the designated mission, she can have an opportunity to regenerate.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/7/10/Vista Processor:  Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB显存 Storage: 2 GB available space
